subtitles:
44416 47852 [ Girl ] People once believed
that when someone dies...

47920 52220 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

55727 60994 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

64203 69197 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

123428 127956 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

128033 131298 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

134873 138832 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

141246 144477 Devil's fuckin' Night.
What's the count so far?

145984 148817 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

148887 153756 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

156728 160061 [ Man ] You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

160132 164933 There are procedures. You should have
cleared this with me first.

165003 167301 - ls this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

167372 170239 - We found her, and you missed it.
- l don't care what her name is.

170309 172903 l didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

172978 176436 l can see why they took away
your gold shield.

176515 179541 Yeah, l wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.

187759 191957 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

192030 194260 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

194333 198269 Look, l will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

211183 215210 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

215287 218552 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
224997 227227 You lied to her about Eric.

228967 232698 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.

244149 249873 Now, come on.
Come on. lt's okay.

272329 276356 [ Sarah ] A building gets torched.
All that is left is ashes.

276433 279334 l used to think that was true
about everything...

283874 287810 But now l know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

287878 292247 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

330485 333682 What are you,
like the night watchman?

355010 358377 You know, what this place
needs is a...

360882 365285 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

365353 368345 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
368423 370721 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
370792 373852 Hey, hey, let me do it.

373929 377956 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

378033 380467 Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

380535 382469 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.

392280 396114 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

396184 400120 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

402057 405754 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?

405827 409058 - They make you fart big time.
- [ Chuckling ]

415370 418100 [ Man ] You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

418173 420801 from all the crap
floating around in it.

421977 425708 l wish l could have seen that.
[ Whistling ]

529617 533553 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

556511 559912 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car, cop car.

567155 569749 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

577799 580461 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.

580535 583834 - Mickey, call it in for me!
- [ Woman Shouting ]

700088 704684 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely.''
lt's pornography.

714702 717762 - [ Shelly ] No! Eric!
- [ Man ] See ya!

768347 771282 - Hey, that's good.
- [ Man ] That's good.

775154 778749 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

782094 786531 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

790202 792193 You go over there
and talk to your pals--

795441 799138 Are you out of
your motherfuckin' mind, man?

823936 828236 wants to bet me
this one isn't?

828307 832209 Hey, fire it up!
Fire it up!

832278 835372 - Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
835448 838246 Fire it up! Fire it up!

841487 843478 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doin'?

878858 882350 - l love you.
- Say that again.

896108 899305 - [ Sarah ] Wow, you look great.
- [ Shelly ] Ta-da!

906352 908912 - Come here! [ Laughing ]
- No, no, no!
955701 959262 * lt doesn't matter how you hide *
959338 962671 * We find you if we're wanting to *

965044 968878 * So slide back down
and close your eyes *

968948 973146 * Sleep a while
you must be tired *

1009655 1013682 24k, huh? lt's 18k.
lt's crap. lt's probably fake.
1016161 1020689 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?

1025371 1028033 l'll give you 50 bucks.
And l hate charities.

1028107 1030940 Now, you,
take it or leave it.

1039785 1042948 - You cheap ass, chrome dome...
- [ Siren Wailing ]

1046091 1048457 Close the gate
when you go out!

1048527 1051189 Oh, l close this up
for you real good, massa.

1053866 1057302 Yeah, sit on it and twirl,
you dirty scum.

1062007 1066467 Lucky l didn't stab
your fat ass.
1087366 1092133 * That point me to another day *

1171483 1174646 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?

1226947 1229609 l ain't murdered nobody, man!
l don't even fucking know you!

1229683 1233779 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- l want you to tell me a story.

1233854 1237255 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1237324 1239884 - You're out of your fucking mind--
- Listen!

1239960 1244829 l'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1244898 1249835 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.

1255509 1261311 Shelly, yeah, yeah. l shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1270557 1275460 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. lt's fun!

1275529 1280159 lt's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1284872 1287432 l'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1323744 1329614 * Sometimes it rains inside my head *

1337524 1341824 - Look at this mess!
What's the world comin' to?
- lt's a mess.
1347034 1349127 * No, they don't have to take you *

1349203 1351967 l got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1352039 1356635 * No, they don't have
to take you away *

1356710 1360043 Get out of my way,
you worms!

1361148 1363082 Give me some of that
over there!

1365319 1369016 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1369089 1373856 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1373927 1377761 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? lt's tragic.

1377831 1382029 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1382102 1386163 - ls the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.

1429116 1433780 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.

1471558 1477690 * No, they don't have
to take you away **

1484338 1487501 [ Man ] Hey, kid,
get the hell outta the road!

1506093 1511622 - [ Clearing Throat ]
- l told you to stay out of here.

1511698 1515361 So l guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1515435 1519462 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?

1525379 1528371 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1534054 1537751 - ''Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.''
- [ Laughing ]
1552773 1555207 Who the fuck is this now?

1562249 1566083 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1573693 1577959 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1585605 1589974 ''Suddenly l heard
a tapping, as if someone...

1590043 1593979 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door.''

1601121 1605251 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fuckin' new door!

1607661 1610653 l'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1642395 1647697 l repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1649336 1652794 lt was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1655509 1659172 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.

1666553 1669522 That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

1669589 1672649 l think you can rule out
accidental death.

1672726 1675524 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1675595 1679759 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1679833 1684566 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1684638 1686572 l'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

1686640 1690406 Word to the wise:
Watch your fuckin' mouth.

1691611 1694011 What the hell
do you call that?

1697751 1701517 l suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1701588 1704352 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1714069 1716697 - Don't you know this game?
- What game?

1716772 1719673 Okay, the rings!
l'll tell you about the rings!

1719741 1724144 They're in that metal box!
lt's under the shelf there!

1724213 1729742 Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1733322 1735916 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1752774 1757006 Oh, it's beautiful.
l don't believe it.

1780869 1783804 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1787042 1789909 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1789978 1792606 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1792681 1795081 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1795150 1800247 T-birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1807229 1809993 - with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1810065 1812727 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1814403 1817804 Each one of these is a life...

1826915 1831079 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1839728 1843926 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1845834 1849895 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1849971 1853600 You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!

1878066 1881524 lt's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.

1888710 1893170 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1908063 1911999 l am the police and l say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.
1912067 1917232 And l say l'm dead and l move.

1920675 1925044 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1925113 1928241 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1930118 1933315 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1933388 1937381 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?

1940195 1944791 l want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

1944866 1949701 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1949771 1954231 - lt's gettin' too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1954309 1956743 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1956812 1961408 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1961483 1964077 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

1964152 1967644 - [ Looter ] Check it out.
- He was already dead.

1967722 1973092 - [ Glass Shattering ]
- He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1973161 1976824 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.

1982604 1986005 - [ Woman Laughing ]
- [ Looter ] Leave it, run!

1995784 1998378 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

1998453 2000785 and you lose him
right out in the open.

2000856 2006692 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. l hate that.

2015070 2018301 Just wish l was a little
hungry again, that's all.

2018373 2022605 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, l may get it, l know.

2058813 2062772 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

2062851 2066082 Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

2066154 2067917 l didn't have nothing
to do with that.

2070725 2074058 l got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

2074129 2076427 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

2076498 2081060 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

2081136 2083696 Gentlemen, by all means,
l think we ought to have...

2083772 2086969 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

2089644 2092204 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2092280 2095078 - Whatever you say, l can do.
- Good.

2098019 2102046 l still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

2102123 2106583 ls that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2106661 2108526 Call it my need to know.

2149871 2153170 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!

2157045 2161345 He was a buttface.
l could have made it.

2161416 2164476 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2168623 2173356 lt's more like surfing than skating.
l wish the rain would stop, just once.

2174529 2178021 - lt can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2194964 2199560 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2199635 2203969 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

2207543 2211775 ''We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments--''

2213983 2216850 Big ''kick me'' sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2216919 2221015 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2221090 2226995 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2227063 2230624 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2230700 2234693 - l know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- l bet he does.

2241711 2245442 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2247717 2252450 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.

2288724 2292421 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.

2317286 2319914 - There's a big fuckin' bird over there.
- * No more **

2358227 2362755 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!

2369639 2372665 lt's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2380583 2385418 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2387423 2392360 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2416952 2419682 Stop me if you heard this one.

2428097 2430861 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2434570 2436800 ''Can you put me up for the night?''

2442311 2446907 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it-- Fuck, does it hurt?

2449118 2453214 Look what you've done
to my sheets.

2477446 2479414 l've got a gun
in my pocket.

2482451 2485181 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2518554 2523048 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2523125 2527892 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2538303 2543104 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2572871 2576534 lf l wanted ice,
l would have asked for ice!
2579978 2583345 Fill it up yourself, macho man.

2598697 2601291 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2601366 2603834 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2603902 2606837 This is a first.
Do l bow or do l curtsy?

2606905 2609703 Get my friend here
a glass of blood.

2618617 2622314 - You stay put right there.
- [ Groaning ]

2664997 2670731 [ Man On Radio ] As you can see, l'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

2670802 2673532 - [ Door Squeaking ]
- the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2673605 2676597 lt was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2676675 2679610 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2679678 2681839 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2681914 2684041 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2684116 2688883 ln fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police--
2691957 2695449 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

2701733 2705430 l saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2705504 2707768 You still have your hat on.
2723622 2727922 are you some kind of... ghost?

2737536 2742098 l don't know what l am. l need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2744109 2748170 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2748246 2751340 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2751416 2756012 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.

2758790 2763159 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.
2763228 2766425 Her body finally just gave it up.

2766498 2770366 l saw it.
l couldn't do jack for her.

2798263 2800356 You stayed with her
the whole time.

2800432 2805893 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2805971 2810704 l was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2810776 2813711 Give me something
l could work with.

2818583 2821074 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2821153 2824486 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

2824556 2828014 would talk after
what happened to you?

2831396 2834058 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.

2840105 2844599 Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2849481 2853474 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2853552 2857044 l used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2869768 2874228 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2878910 2882107 You going to vanish
into thin air again?

2885750 2888446 l thought l'd use
your front door.

2891490 2897326 Look, man, l'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2908406 2911933 [ Gideon ] l got stabbed!
l shot the son of a bitch!

2912010 2915138 l watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2915213 2918273 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2918350 2921581 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

2921653 2924178 l saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2924256 2928693 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2933865 2936333 - What else did you see?
- So far l haven't heard...

2936401 2938892 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2938970 2944499 What do l get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.

2947412 2952509 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!

2959791 2962225 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2962294 2964285 What're you tellin' me,
this thing is real?

2964362 2968025 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2968099 2972058 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2972137 2976267 You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

2979077 2984242 Eyes see. lt's one of the most important
things l learned from my sister.

2984316 2987581 Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister? [ Laughing ]

2991056 2994253 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

2994326 2996590 Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

2996661 3000156 With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

3000289 3003747 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

3003826 3007227 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.

3009599 3013365 Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.

3016606 3021270 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

3021344 3025713 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
3025782 3028478 l ain't makin' all this up.

3028551 3033079 l ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

3041631 3046659 A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

3056913 3059905 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

3069225 3071523 Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

3074263 3079132 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

3079202 3083138 l'll have the janitor
come on up.
3154810 3156744 * lt can't rain all the time *

3156812 3161340 [ Skipping ]
* Can't rain all the time *

3170426 3173122 [ T-bird ] l don't know how many times l
gotta tell you. We're in this together!
3173195 3176130 One part falls, it all falls!

3176198 3179656 - You know how long it took us
to put this together?
- Yeah, a long time.

3179735 3182295 That piece of ratshit made Tin Tin
into a fuckin' voodoo doll!

3187610 3191808 Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!

3243699 3247260 What the fuck are
you supposed to be, man?

3275531 3278796 - Oh, shit!
- What the fuck's the matter with you?

3289845 3294282 What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? l got it.

3295885 3298786 We could use you.
You did Tin Tin.

3298854 3301948 - This is business, right?
- [ Gun Cocks ] Faster.

3309165 3311565 l hate this.
They can't even call it cream legally.

3313169 3316138 - What in the crap--
- [ Tires Screech, Siren Wails ]

3322545 3325241 When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

3330820 3333812 This is Vehicle 48. We got us
a big, old, red hot rod.

3339829 3342593 You got something personal, amigo,
we can work it out.

3362218 3364448 Oh, my God!
Get outta the way!

3375531 3379797 - [ Engine Rattling ]
- Holy shit! Goddamn foreign cars!

3393082 3396779 Oh, l hate this.
This ain't good.

3419909 3423140 But l don't know what--
What? Huh? What?

3423212 3425976 What are you talkin' about?
No, no, no, no, no.

3426048 3429142 You mean that place downtown?
Yeah, l remember her.

3429218 3431379 We needed to put some fear
into that little lady.

3431453 3434718 She wasn't going along
with our tenant relocation program.

3434790 3438385 And her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear...

3438460 3441896 into a total cluster fuck!
Who gives a shit?

3441964 3445229 lt's ancient history!
Why? What do you want?

3445301 3450204 What is it? What?
Speak to me. Speak!

3461217 3466416 l know you. l know you.
l knew l knew you.

3466488 3470579 l knew l knew you.
But you ain't you.

3470712 3474671 You can't be you. We put you through
the window. There ain't no coming back.

3474750 3478186 This is the really real world.
There ain't no coming back.

3478253 3480619 We killed you dead.
There ain't no coming back.

3485227 3488196 There ain't no coming back!
There ain't no coming back!
3498440 3501375 and felt how awful goodness is.''

3571346 3573644 [ Woman ] This is the 7:00 a.m. edition
of Action News.

3573715 3576047 For over a decade,
the night before Halloween...

3576118 3580487 has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city, ''Devil's Night''...

3580555 3583991 the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

3584059 3589429 Last year over 200 blazes were reported,
and 11 people lost their lives.

3589498 3594663 Tonight may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever.

3594736 3598365 The mayor has firefighters
from all surrounding counties--

3598440 3602240 Do you like them up or over?
l can't remember.

3604279 3607009 What are you doing?
l don't even like eggs.

3607082 3612019 - Wait, you loved eggs.
- Yeah, when l was five.

3612087 3616217 So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

3616291 3619624 So what did you take
to become mother of the year?

3619695 3624792 Oh, it wasn't drugs.
Someone kind of woke me up.

3630706 3635939 You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?

3638447 3642747 Oh, forget it. l never was
too good at this mommy shit.

3667409 3670344 This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

3670412 3673677 We just fished this out of the river.
He's fused to his own car.

3673749 3677981 - We're gonna have to l.D. his teeth.
- His name is T-bird.

3680055 3682023 Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.

3694169 3697696 l got a goddamn vigilante killer
knocking off scumbags left and right...

3701109 3703543 Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

3703612 3707514 - You're the detective. You tell me.
- Okay.

3707582 3709709 Gideon's blows all to hell and you're
having a chitchat with some weirdo...

3709785 3712652 who winds up in T-bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

3712721 3715690 Then you steal one of
my case files from homicide...

3715757 3717691 and you're saying this is
just a fuckin' automobile accident?

3717759 3720057 - Come on!
- Yeah. Good speech though.

3720128 3722153 l didn't want to interrupt you.
lt sounded good.
3722230 3724198 You gotta write that shit down.

3726268 3729328 The captain's got a little
love note waiting for you.

3729404 3733340 - Welcome to the first day
of the rest of your suspension.
- Suspension?

3737212 3741239 [ Dials Phone ]
Yeah, give me the lab.

3791967 3794561 [ Shelly ] One for sorrow,
two for joy...

3794636 3797469 - Come here.
- ...three for a girl, four for a boy.

3895604 3899370 You said,
''Can't rain all the time.''
3899441 3902706 That is from your song, right?
